briefTitle: A Study of the Efficacy and Safety of DFD-06 Cream in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Multicenter, Parallel Group Study of the Efficacy and Safety of DFD-06 Cream in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis for 14 Days
summary: This study will compare the efficacy and safety of DFD-06 Cream to Vehicle Cream for topical treatment of moderate to severe plaque psoriasis after 3, 7, and 14 days of treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy (Percentage of Subjects With Treatment Success)
